title: Introducing Copilot+ PCs
snippet: Microsoft launched a new AI-PC category with on-device NPU features and system-level AI experiences, previewed just ahead of Build 2024.

title: Microsoft Build 2024: all the news and announcements
snippet: Build focused on AI across Windows and Azure, Copilot enhancements, and developer tooling for the next wave of AI apps.

title: EU takes closer look at Microsoft–OpenAI partnership
snippet: The European Commission sought more information about the competitive impact of Microsoft’s multibillion-dollar OpenAI deal.

title: Qualcomm unveils Snapdragon Dev Kit for Windows at Build
snippet: A compact Snapdragon X Elite dev box arrived to accelerate Copilot+ PC app development.

title: Microsoft reports strong fiscal year 2024 results with 16% revenue growth
snippet: Microsoft reported FY2024 revenue of $245.1B (+16% YoY), operating income of $109.4B (+24% YoY), and net income of $88.1B (+22% YoY), driven by cloud services growth.

title: Microsoft’s all-knowing Recall AI feature is being delayed
snippet: Microsoft pulled the controversial 'Recall' feature from the Copilot+ PC launch to test it with Windows Insiders first.

title: Microsoft Cloud strength drives fourth quarter results
snippet: FY24 Q4 revenue hit $64.7B (+15% YoY) with Azure and Intelligent Cloud leading growth.
